Description: Business activities in this sub-class involve providing various personal services not classified elsewhere, such as escort services and marriage bureaus. Core operations may include arranging social interactions, companionship, or dates through escort services, and facilitating matrimonial alliances via marriage bureaus. Services typically involve client consultation, profile creation, matchmaking, and arrangement of meetings or social events.

Division Name: Other personal service activities
Class Name: Other personal service activities n.e.c.
Sub-class Name: Pet care services such as boarding, grooming and training pets etc.
Description: Providing pet care services such as boarding, grooming, and training pets. This involves offering temporary accommodation for pets while their owners are away, maintaining their hygiene through grooming services, and teaching them specific behaviors or skills through training sessions. Additional services may also include pet walking, feeding, and providing medical care if necessary.

Division Name: Other personal service activities
Class Name: Other personal service activities n.e.c.
Sub-class Name: Shoe shiners, porters, valet car parkers etc.
Description: Business activities in this sub-class involve providing various personal services not categorized elsewhere. These services include shoe shining, where professionals clean and polish footwear to improve its appearance. Porter services, which involve carrying luggage or other loads for customers, typically in hotels, airports, or train stations. Valet car parking services are also included, where trained staff park and retrieve vehicles for guests or customers at restaurants, hotels, and other venues. These services are often characterized by direct interaction with customers and aim to enhance convenience and customer experience.

Division Name: Other personal service activities
Class Name: Other personal service activities n.e.c.
Sub-class Name: Coin-operated personal service machines such as photo booths, weighing machines, blood pressure checking machines etc.
Description: Operating coin-operated personal service machines such as photo booths, weighing machines, and blood pressure checking machines. This business activity involves the installation, maintenance, and operation of these machines, typically in public spaces. Services provided may include capturing instant photographs, measuring weight, or checking blood pressure for a fee.

Division Name: Other personal service activities
Class Name: Other personal service activities n.e.c.
Sub-class Name: Activities of sauna and steam baths, massage salons etc.
Description: The operation of sauna and steam baths, massage salons, and similar facilities. This involves providing wellness and relaxation services such as heat therapy, steam treatments, and various types of massages. The business activities could also include maintaining and cleaning the facilities, scheduling appointments, and ensuring a relaxing and hygienic environment for clients.

Division Name: Other personal service activities
Class Name: Other personal service activities n.e.c.
Sub-class Name: Astrological and spiritualists? activities
Description: Business activities in this sub-class involve providing astrological and spiritualist services. These services typically include astrological chart reading, palm reading, numerology, and other related activities. Spiritualist services often encompass mediumship, psychic reading, and other practices intended to communicate with or gain insight from the spiritual realm. These businesses may also provide related goods, such as crystals, talismans, or spiritual texts.

Division Name: Other personal service activities
Class Name: Other personal service activities n.e.c.
Sub-class Name: Activities of aaya, dhai, governess, baby sitter etc.
Description: Providing personal care services such as babysitting, governess services, and aaya or dhai services, which are traditional forms of childcare and postnatal care in certain cultures. Typical operations may involve caring for children, helping with their education, and assisting new mothers with postnatal care and recovery. This could also include activities like preparing meals, ensuring safety, hygiene maintenance, and providing companionship and emotional support.

Division Name: Other personal service activities
Class Name: Other personal service activities n.e.c.
Sub-class Name: General household maintenance activities like grooming of the floor, dusting, cleaning of utensils etc.
Description: General household maintenance activities encompass a wide range of services aimed at keeping homes clean and well-kept. These services typically include floor grooming, dusting, and cleaning of utensils, among others. Businesses operating in this area ensure that homes are tidy and hygienic, undertaking tasks that homeowners may not have the time, ability, or inclination to do themselves. This can involve routine cleaning tasks, deep-cleaning services, and even specialized cleaning for particular household items or areas.

Section Name: Activities of households as employers; undifferentiated goods- and services producing activities of households for own use
Division Name: Activities of households as employers of domestic personnel
Group Name: Activities of households as employers of domestic personnel
Class Name: Activities of households as employers of domestic personnel
Sub-class Name: Activities of households as employers of domestic personnel
Description: Hiring and managing domestic personnel such as maids, cooks, gardeners, drivers, and nannies by households. This involves handling the recruitment, training, payment, and supervision of these domestic staff members. The service provided is primarily for the personal use of the household members and not for commercial or business purposes.

Section Name: Activities of households as employers; undifferentiated goods- and services producing activities of households for own use
Division Name: Undifferentiated goods- and services-producing activities of private households for own use
Group Name: Undifferentiated goods-producing activities of private households for own use
Class Name: Undifferentiated goods-producing activities of private households for own use
Sub-class Name: Undifferentiated goods-producing activities of private households for own use
Description: Private households engaging in undifferentiated goods-producing activities for their own use are involved in a range of operations. This typically includes the production of various goods for personal consumption, such as growing vegetables, raising livestock, or creating homemade products. The primary purpose of these activities is to fulfill the household's needs rather than for commercial sale or exchange. The process involves all stages from raw material collection or cultivation to the final production of the good.

Section Name: Activities of households as employers; undifferentiated goods- and services producing activities of households for own use
Division Name: Undifferentiated goods- and services-producing activities of private households for own use
Group Name: Undifferentiated service-producing activities of private households for own use
Class Name: Undifferentiated service-producing activities of private households for own use
Sub-class Name: Undifferentiated service-producing activities of private households for own use
Description: Private households engaging in undifferentiated service-producing activities for their own use. This involves a range of services such as cooking, cleaning, and maintenance tasks that are not outsourced but performed by the household members themselves. These activities are not specialized or differentiated, meaning they are not split into separate business operations but are conducted as a part of the household's daily routine.

Section Name: Activities of extraterritorial organizations and bodies
Division Name: Activities of extraterritorial organizations and bodies
Group Name: Activities of extraterritorial organizations and bodies
Class Name: Activities of extraterritorial organizations and bodies
Sub-class Name: Activities of extraterritorial organizations and bodies
Description: Operations of organizations and bodies that function beyond national boundaries, including international institutions, multinational corporations, and diplomatic agencies. These activities may encompass a wide range of functions, such as policy making, enforcement of international agreements, coordination of multinational operations, provision of humanitarian aid, and facilitation of international diplomacy and cooperation.
